skills.name: Laser
skills.description: Rapid-fire weapon that deals continuous DMG to targets along a straight line of fire. Continuous firing will overheat the weapon. Closer enemies take more DMG (maxes at 10-meter range or less).

skills.name: Paralyzing Current
skills.description: 1.5% chance to paralyze a target, preventing it from moving or attacking for 3.00s.
